EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Taking Advantage of All Your Aircraft Data?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Quash Unscheduled Flight Disruptions
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Improve aircraft turnaround times with the latest Connected Aircraft technology. Honeywellâ€™s GoDirect Connected Maintenance applies advanced analytics to data generated by the aircraft in real time to accurately predict and pinpoint component failures 99% of the time. It helps decrease inoperative equipment by up to 35%. Watch how one airline boosted performance and passenger experience using the GoDirect Connected Maintenance solution in this success story <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/auxiliary-power-and-thermal/godirect-connected-maintenance-for-apus]]>.
Do you want to turn your fleet around more quickly?
GET CONNECTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
